___compilerOptions.description: Instructs the TypeScript compiler how to compile .ts files.

___noEmitOnError.description: Do not emit outputs if any type checking errors were reported.

___emitBOM.description: Emit a UTF-8 Byte Order Mark (BOM) in the beginning of output files.

___preserveConstEnums.description: Do not erase const enum declarations in generated code.

___rootDirs.description: Specify list of root directory to be used when resolving modules.

___skipLibCheck.description: Skip type checking of declaration files. Requires TypeScript version 2.0 or later.

___noImplicitReturns.description: Report error when not all code paths in function return a value.

___rootDir.description: Specifies the root directory of input files. Use to control the output directory structure with --outDir.

___noImplicitThis.description: Raise error on 'this' expressions with an implied any type.

___suppressImplicitAnyIndexErrors.description: Suppress noImplicitAny errors for indexing objects lacking index signatures.

___maxNodeModuleJsDepth.description: The maximum dependency depth to search under node_modules and load JavaScript files. Only applicable with --allowJs.

___baseUrl.description: Base directory to resolve non-relative module names.

___allowSyntheticDefaultImports.description: Allow default imports from modules with no default export. This does not affect code emit, just typechecking.

___lib.description: Specify library file to be included in the compilation. Requires TypeScript version 2.0 or later.

___charset.description: The character set of the input files.

___stripInternal.description: Do not emit declarations for code that has an '@internal' annotation.

___forceConsistentCasingInFileNames.description: Disallow inconsistently-cased references to the same file.

___target.description: Specify ECMAScript target version. Permitted values are 'es3', 'es5', 'es2015', 'es2016', 'es2017' or 'esnext'.

___allowUnreachableCode.description: Do not report errors on unreachable code.

___noLib.description: Do not include the default library file (lib.d.ts).

___isolatedModules.description: Unconditionally emit imports for unresolved files.

___jsxFactory.description: Specify the JSX factory function to use when targeting react JSX emit, e.g. 'React.createElement' or 'h'. Requires TypeScript version 2.1 or later.

___paths.description: Specify path mapping to be computed relative to baseUrl option.

___inlineSources.description: Emit the source alongside the sourcemaps within a single file; requires --inlineSourceMap to be set.

___allowUnusedLabels.description: Do not report errors on unused labels.

___outFile.description: Concatenate and emit output to single file.

___strictNullChecks.description: Enable strict null checks. Requires TypeScript version 2.0 or later.

___pretty.description: Stylize errors and messages using color and context (experimental).

___noImplicitAny.description: Warn on expressions and declarations with an implied 'any' type.

___suppressExcessPropertyErrors.description: Suppress excess property checks for object literals.

___noImplicitUseStrict.description: Do not emit 'use strict' directives in module output.

___listEmittedFiles.description: Enable to list all emitted files. Requires TypeScript version 2.0 or later.

___typeRoots.description: Specify list of directory for type definition files to be include. Requires TypeScript version 2.0 or later.

___noEmitHelpers.description: Do not generate custom helper functions like __extends in compiled output.

___noFallthroughCasesInSwitch.description: Report errors for fallthrough cases in switch statement.

___locale.description: The locale to use to show error messages, e.g. en-us.

___importHelpers.description: Import emit helpers (e.g. '__extends', '__rest', etc..) from tslib. Requires TypeScript version 2.1 or later.

___checkJs.description: Report errors in .js files. Requires TypeScript version 2.3 or later.

___noUnusedParameters.description: Report errors on unused parameters. Requires TypeScript version 2.0 or later.

___listFiles.description: Print names of files part of the compilation.

___mapRoot.description: Specifies the location where debugger should locate map files instead of generated locations

___outDir.description: Redirect output structure to the directory.

___types.description: Type declaration files to be included in compilation. Requires TypeScript version 2.0 or later.

___allowJs.description: Allow javascript files to be compiled.

___reactNamespace.description: Specifies the object invoked for createElement and __spread when targeting 'react' JSX emit.

___traceResolution.description: Enable tracing of the name resolution process.

___removeComments.description: Do not emit comments to output.

___emitDecoratorMetadata.description: Emit design-type metadata for decorated declarations in source.

___sourceRoot.description: Specifies the location where debugger should locate TypeScript files instead of source locations.

___experimentalDecorators.description: Enables experimental support for ES7 decorators.

___newLine.description: Specifies the end of line sequence to be used when emitting files: 'CRLF' (dos) or 'LF' (unix).

___inlineSourceMap.description: Emit a single file with source maps instead of having a separate file.

___noResolve.description: Do not add triple-slash references or module import targets to the list of compiled files.

___declarationDir.description: Specify output directory for generated declaration files. Requires TypeScript version 2.0 or later.

___alwaysStrict.description: Parse in strict mode and emit 'use strict' for each source file. Requires TypeScript version 2.1 or later.

___noUnusedLocals.description: Report errors on unused locals. Requires TypeScript version 2.0 or later.

___moduleResolution.description: Specifies module resolution strategy: 'node' (Node) or 'classic' (TypeScript pre 1.6) .

___typeAcquisition.description: Auto type (.d.ts) acquisition options for this project. Requires TypeScript version 2.1 or later.

___include.description: Specifies a list of type declarations to be included in auto type acquisition. Ex. ["jquery", "lodash"]

___exclude.description: Specifies a list of type declarations to be excluded from auto type acquisition. Ex. ["jquery", "lodash"]

___extends.description: Path to base configuration file to inherit from. Requires TypeScript version 2.1 or later.

___files.description: If no 'files' or 'include' property is present in a tsconfig.json, the compiler defaults to including all files in the containing directory and subdirectories except those specified by 'exclude'. When a 'files' property is specified, only those files and those specified by 'include' are included.

___exclude.description: Specifies a list of files to be excluded from compilation. The 'exclude' property only affects the files included via the 'include' property and not the 'files' property. Glob patterns require TypeScript version 2.0 or later.

___include.description: Specifies a list of glob patterns that match files to be included in compilation. If no 'files' or 'include' property is present in a tsconfig.json, the compiler defaults to including all files in the containing directory and subdirectories except those specified by 'exclude'. Requires TypeScript version 2.0 or later.

title: JSON schema for the TypeScript compiler's configuration file

___include.description: Specifies a list of glob patterns that match files to be included in compilation. If no 'files' or 'include' property is present in a tsconfig.json, the compiler defaults to including all files in the containing directory and subdirectories except those specified by 'exclude'. Requires TypeScript version 2.0 or later.
